abstract.t: This document describes the reasons for the design choices in IKEv2,the protocol described in draft-ietf-ipsec-ikev2-01.txt. Thisdocument describes why certain features are supported, and explainsthe modifications between the second draft of IKEv2 and the first. Itdescribes both the changes we chose to make and the changes that weconsidered but chose not to make. The changes are minor and mostlybased on feedback received from the first draft.
